Local anaesthesia administration devices ——re Laryngotracheal Smiths Medical 7031/61 Enables topicalisation via vocal cords of the trachea. anaesthesia kit (TA) 55 Mthembu DVCANKITB 360 degree Mucosal atomisation Teleflex MADgic laryngo-tracheal Atomisation of local anaesthesia of nasal mucosa and pharyngeal mucosa devices atomiser through the mouth is made really easy.
